title: PODCAST: Tux rentals tucker out
teaser: The Pope's opinions on climate change; Humvees and the military; and tuxedo rentals take a tumble.
description: The Pope's opinions on climate change; Humvees and the military; and tuxedo rentals take a tumble.
contentencoded: The Pope weighs in on climate change, and why it's an economic change, as well. Plus, the Army is looking to replace its Humvee with a new vehicle. And that means an opportunity for a defense contractor. Next: it used to be a rite of passage to rent a tuxedo when it came time to go to prom or get married. But the tuxedo rental business may be fading away. We take a look at why.
